summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NoYzzing OPS - Puzzles & Conquest Strategy Command Center. Both backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. All core features tested successfully including ChatBot, newsletter subscription, search functionality, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Backend API health check - all endpoints operational
Newsletter subscription API with validation and duplicate handling
Contact form API submission
Statistics API returning correct data
CORS configuration properly set
Homepage loads with proper header and all navigation links (HOME, MILITARY, CALCULATOR, EVENTS, BOS, REGISTRY)
Hero section displays 'SYSTEM ONLINE' badge and 'CONQUEST MASTERED' title
Typing animation working ('INITIALIZING STRATEGY PROTOCOLS...')
CTA buttons 'INITIATE GUIDES' and 'ACCESS TOOLS' functional
Alliance banner with ROL info and Discord links
Guides section shows all 3 cards (Military Expedition, Troop Strength, Talent Memory)
Tools section shows all 5 cards (Troop Calculator, Code Name Hawkins, Pocket Conquest, Hogwarts Registry, Pokemon Registry)
Sidebar Commander Profile, Buy Me a Coffee button, Newsletter subscribe form
Footer with 4 columns (Brand, Guides, Tools, Legal) and proper links
NoyzBot chatbot opens/closes, sends messages, receives AI responses using local fallback
Newsletter subscription form successfully submits to backend API
Search toggle opens search input field
All navigation links point to correct sub-page paths
SEO meta tags complete (description, keywords, OG tags, Twitter cards)
Mobile responsiveness with working mobile menu
All buttons and links properly clickable

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components and interactions functional
success_percentage.integration: 100% - Newsletter form successfully integrates with backend API
success_percentage.seo: 100% - Complete meta tags and social media cards
